name: Devon Smith
Comment: I am satisfied  with the product

name: Christian
Comment: Finally has me happy to own this laptop.

name: Nick
Comment: After having a few weeks with the LG Gram, i can absolutely say this is the best laptop i have ever owned. I have had many laptops for decades, and have had desktop pcs that I build myself.

name: G. Rodriguez
Comment: This is my second LG Gram so far. I bought my first one over three years ago and till this day it runs like new.

name: Capt. Jack
Comment: It works well and is light. i7 11th gen is speedy. No issues, none.

name: Zane
Comment: Light, powerful, fast, long battery life. Love this computer
